translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: シーラ様やヒューバートさん、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Lady Sheila, Hubert-san,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 多くのヘルマン人と懇意になるまでに至ったわけ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: have come to be on friendly terms with many of the Helmann people.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「さって、それではヘルマンのいる
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Now then, let me introduce you to the familiar faces of Helmann!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: お馴染みの方々をご紹介よ！」
「まずは国のトップ！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: First, the top of the country!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 大統領兼ランス様の奴隷！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The president and Lance-sama's slave!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: シーラ・ヘルマン様ー！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Lady Sheila Helmann!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「きゃー！　可愛いー！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Kya! So cute!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 頭ぺしぺし叩かれてー！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Being patted on the head repeatedly!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「どんな方かは本編でも説明されたので割愛！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Since you've already been told who she is in the main story, I'll skip the explanation!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「そんなシーラ様の兄にして、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Then there's Lady Sheila's older brother,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランス様の……ご友人？
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Lance-sama's... friend?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: であるパットン・ヘルマン様！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Sir Patton Helmann!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「この方はゼスの騒動の時から
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: This person began cooperating with Lance-sama on adventures since the Zeth incident,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランス様とは協力して冒険するようになり、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and they have been adventuring together,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ご友人……ご友人なんじゃないかしら……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Friends... or maybe friends, I guess...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「正直……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: To be honest...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランス様のご友人判定ってなされたのは
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: the only person officially recognized as Lance-sama's friend

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: JAPANの信長様だけなのでよく分からなくて……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: is Nobunaga-sama of JAPAN, so I don't really understand...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「死んだら素直になるだけな気もするので、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I feel like they'd just become sincere if they died,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ちょっとパットン様もリック様も
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: so maybe Patton-sama and Rick-sama

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 死んでみてもらえないかしら……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: could try dying a bit...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「いや、死なれたら困る困る。私泣くし」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: No, that would be a problem if they actually died. I'd cry.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「で、他の方々に関しては……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: As for the others...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「これは本編で確認してね！　あなた！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Please check the main story for this, okay!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「今回は自由都市の国々のお話ー！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: This time it's a story about the Free Cities!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: あなた、あなた、よく聞いててね！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: You, you, listen carefully!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「と言ってもこの辺りって、今回初の話だから、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: That said, this is the first time we're talking about this area,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 知らなかったあなたにご説明を！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: so I'll explain it to those of you who didn't know!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: なーんて必要はないんだけどね
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Though, really, it's not all that necessary.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ってなわけで、ランス様が聞いていたように、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: So then, as Lance-sama heard,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 自由都市は他国と比べると特殊な地帯
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: the Free Cities are a unique region compared to other countries.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「自由都市とひとまとめにされるけど、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: They are collectively called Free Cities,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 小国が沢山ある地帯の名称であって、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: but they're actually a name for an area with many small countries,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 自由都市という国名ではないのよね
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: not a single country named Free Cities.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「その国の数は大小合わせておよそ30！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The number of countries, big and small, is about 30!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「それでもって、その約30の都市国家を
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: And those roughly 30 city-states

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: まとめているのが私の右側にいる
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: are collectively represented by these seven people on my right.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: こちらの7人ってわけね
「特別な7人の内に数えられるなんて……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: To be counted among the special seven...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「いやー、出て来た時は普通（？）の
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Wow, when Custom first appeared, it was an ordinary (?) city-state,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 都市国家だったカスタムも立派になったのねー
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: but now Custom has become quite distinguished.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ちなみに大昔、ランス様が解決なさった
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: By the way, a long time ago, when Lance-sama settled the issue,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: カスタムの街が陥落する事件のとき、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: when the city of Custom was on the brink of falling,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: マリアさんが新しい街を作るわと意気込んでたの
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Maria-san enthusiastically said she would build a new city.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「これからカスタムは
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: From now on, Custom will

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 近代都市に生まれ変わるんだから！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: be reborn as a modern city!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: と仰ってたけど実現させたのねー
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: She said that, and she actually made it happen.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「近代……うん、近代？
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Modern... yeah, modern?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: むしろ、ちょい未来気味？
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Or rather, a bit futuristic?

translationLines.description: Array of objects, each representing a line from the input

originalJapaneseLine.description: The original line in Japanese exactly as it was in the input

translatedEnglishLine.description: The original line translated to English

translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: That said, this is the first time we're talking about this area,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 知らなかったあなたにご説明を！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: so I'll explain it to those of you who didn't know!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: なーんて必要はないんだけどね
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Though, really, it's not all that necessary.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ってなわけで、ランス様が聞いていたように、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: So then, as Lance-sama heard,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 自由都市は他国と比べると特殊な地帯
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: the Free Cities are a unique region compared to other countries.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「自由都市とひとまとめにされるけど、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: They are collectively called Free Cities,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 小国が沢山ある地帯の名称であって、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: but they're actually a name for an area with many small countries,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 自由都市という国名ではないのよね
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: not a single country named Free Cities.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「その国の数は大小合わせておよそ30！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The number of countries, big and small, is about 30!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「それでもって、その約30の都市国家を
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: And those roughly 30 city-states

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: まとめているのが私の右側にいる
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: are collectively represented by these seven people on my right.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: こちらの7人ってわけね
「特別な7人の内に数えられるなんて……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: To be counted among the special seven...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「いやー、出て来た時は普通（？）の
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Wow, when Custom first appeared, it was an ordinary (?) city-state,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 都市国家だったカスタムも立派になったのねー
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: but now Custom has become quite distinguished.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ちなみに大昔、ランス様が解決なさった
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: By the way, a long time ago, when Lance-sama settled the issue,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: カスタムの街が陥落する事件のとき、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: when the city of Custom was on the brink of falling,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: マリアさんが新しい街を作るわと意気込んでたの
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Maria-san enthusiastically said she would build a new city.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「これからカスタムは
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: From now on, Custom will

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 近代都市に生まれ変わるんだから！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: be reborn as a modern city!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: と仰ってたけど実現させたのねー
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: She said that, and she actually made it happen.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「近代……うん、近代？
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Modern... yeah, modern?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: むしろ、ちょい未来気味？
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Or rather, a bit futuristic?
